channel.title: Anyone knows about (mp3haynhat.com)?
channel.description:
Hi guys, I encountered a web mp3 site, that i think it collects all the tracks (content) from SoundCloud. Even what i have listen too.
Anyone know about this? Is this legit? I suspect that everything from SoundCloud is in there. It‚Äôs good if someone can clear this things up üò≥
P.s: you can search your SC username, and see what happens, link below üëáüèº
[http://mp3haynhat.com/](http://mp3haynhat.com/mp3user/340824718?u=charlesgedius)
Disclaimer from the site üò≥ ![image|281x499](upload://mgNaMhamETIDVbrAr7ifh2isIL1.png)

item.title: Anyone knows about (mp3haynhat.com)?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
Norfleet:

Top Likers could be calculated, but it might be a waste of RAM, especially for bigger artists

Indeed. The amount of programmatic cross-referencing would be very heavy ‚Äì so much so that it‚Äôs likely that SC would prohibit 3rd-party attempts due to the heavy traffic it would create for their API and flag attempts as suspicious activity.

On smaller accounts where it would be less demanding, no-one cares enough to crunch the data. On larger accounts, where the data might be broadly interesting, it‚Äôs likely too demanding on the system for SC to allow attempts.

Read full topic

Top Likers could be calculated, but it might be a waste of RAM, especially for bigger artists

item.title: Anyone knows about (mp3haynhat.com)?
item.dc:creator: akabillposters
item.description:
That‚Äôs correct.

Your Likes, Follows, Followers and Comments are all available in the sidebar on your Profile page.
On the flip-side, you can see everyone who‚Äôs Liked (or Commented on, of course) a track on every Track page.

It‚Äôs data that SC makes public.

 
Stats such as ‚Äòtop listeners‚Äô, ‚Äòtop Likers‚Äô, etc‚Ä¶ are private.

Read full topic

item.title: Anyone knows about (mp3haynhat.com)?
item.dc:creator: FLB100
item.description:
Ok, this website is really weird, I looked up my name, it had the Soundcloud song (no DL though so that‚Äôs good) and it had a link to the YouTube video. It also had (and this is the weirdest thing) a playlist of the songs I favourited, IN EXACT ORDER. THIS THING HAD ACCESS TO MY ACCOUNT.

Read full topic

Yea man, the disclaimer did said about ‚Äúdownload‚Äù track, Maybe any SC Premium user can clarify in the SC and the site?

As far as i know my tracks that is Private in SC, is not available in the site

item.title: Anyone knows about (mp3haynhat.com)?
item.dc:creator: blakkaz
item.description:
Soundcloud has an API, so it‚Äôs possible to build your own applications on top of it.

This site looks like it enables downloads of tracks that aren‚Äôt enabled on SC though, which is a no-no.

Read full topic
